data.question: How do you implement cloud financial management?
ans: b.Establish a partnership between finance and technology
d.Implement cost awareness in your organizational processes
e.Report and notify on cost optimization
g.Keep up to date with new service releases

data.question: How do you govern usage?
ans: a.Develop policies based on your organization requirements

data.question: How do you monitor usage and cost?
ans: d.Configure billing and cost management tools
e.Add organization information to cost and usage
f.Allocate costs based on workload metrics

data.question: How do you decommission resources?
ans: a.Track resources over their life time

data.question: How do you evaluate cost when you select services?
ans: b.Analyze all components of this workload
c.Perform a thorough analysis of each component
d.Select software with cost effective licensing
e.Select components of this workload to optimize cost in line with organization priorities
f.Perform cost analysis for different usage over time

data.question: How do you meet cost targets when you select resource type, size and number?
ans: b.Select resource type, size, and number based on data
c.Select resource type, size, and number automatically based on metrics

data.question: How do you use pricing models to reduce cost?
ans: c.Select third party agreements with cost efficient terms
d.Implement pricing models for all components of this workload
e.Perform pricing model analysis at the master account level

data.question: How do you plan for data transfer charges?
ans: b.Select components to optimize data transfer cost
c.Implement services to reduce data transfer costs

data.question: How do you manage demand, and supply resources?
ans: a.Perform an analysis on the workload demand
b.Implement a buffer or throttle to manage demand

data.question: How do you evaluate new services?
ans: b.Review and analyze this workload regularly
